lead_paragraph: The Super Bowl champs begin training camp Thursday with major questions on both sides of the ball, beginning with who will be the one throwing it.

headline.print_headline: Questions Abound on Offense, Defense for Super Bowl Champs
headline.main: Questions Abound on Offense, Defense for Super Bowl Champs

snippet: The Super Bowl champs begin training camp Thursday with major questions on both sides of the ball, beginning with who will be the one throwing it....
